flavorText: The glorious city of Pachatupa is the center of the Sun Empire, and Tocatli, the emperor's palace, is its glowing heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Die glorreiche Stadt Pachatupa stellt das Zentrum des Imperiums der Sonne dar und Tocatli, der imperiale Palast, symbolisiert sein glühendes Herz.
foreignData.name: Tocatli-Ehrengarde
foreignData.text: Kreaturen, die ins Spiel kommen, lösen keine Fähigkeiten aus.

foreignData.flavorText: La gloriosa ciudad de Pachatupa es el centro del Imperio del Sol, y Tocatli, el palacio del emperador, su brillante corazón.
foreignData.name: Guardia de honor de Tocatli
foreignData.text: Las criaturas no hacen que se disparen habilidades cuando entran al campo de batalla.

foreignData.flavorText: Tocatli, le palais de l'empereur, est le cœur resplendissant de la glorieuse cité de Pachatupa, centre autour duquel irradie l'Empire du Soleil.
foreignData.name: Garde d'honneur de Tocatli
foreignData.text: Les créatures qui arrivent sur le champ de bataille ne provoquent pas le déclenchement des capacités.

foreignData.flavorText: La gloriosa città di Pachatupa è il centro dell'Impero del Sole e Toxatli, il palazzo dell'Imperatore, ne è il cuore splendente.
foreignData.name: Guardia d'Onore di Toxatli
foreignData.text: Le creature che entrano nel campo di battaglia non fanno innescare le abilità.

foreignData.flavorText: 壮大な都市パチャチュパは、太陽帝国の中心地である。皇帝の宮殿トカートリは、その光る心臓である。
foreignData.name: トカートリの儀仗兵
foreignData.text: 戦場に出るクリーチャーは能力を誘発させない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: 영광스런 도시 파차투파는 태양 제국의 중심에 있고, 그 한가운데에는 황궁인 토카틀리가 눈부시게 빛나고 있다.
foreignData.name: 토카틀리 의장대
foreignData.text: 전장에 들어오는 생물들은 능력을 격발시키지 않는다.

foreignData.flavorText: A gloriosa cidade de Pachatupa é o centro do Império do Sol, e Tocatli, o palácio do imperador, é seu coração reluzente.
foreignData.name: Guarda de Honra do Tocatli
foreignData.text: As criaturas não desencadeiam habilidades ao entrar no campo de batalha.

foreignData.flavorText: Славный город Пачатупа — центр Империи Солнца, а императорский дворец Токатли — его сверкающее сердце.
foreignData.name: Почетный Караул Токатли
foreignData.text: Выходящие на поле битвы существа не вызывают срабатывания способностей.

foreignData.flavorText: 辉煌的帕查图帕城是烈阳帝国的中心，皇宫托卡特理则是其炽热心脏。
foreignData.name: 托卡特理仪队兵
foreignData.text: 进战场的生物不会触发异能。

foreignData.flavorText: 輝煌的帕查圖帕城是烈陽帝國的中心，皇宮托卡特理則是其熾熱心臟。
foreignData.name: 托卡特理儀隊兵
foreignData.text: 進戰場的生物不會觸發異能。

name: Tocatli Honor Guard
originalText: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

rulings.text: Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re usually written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].”

Replacement effects, such as a permanent entering the battlefield tapped or with counters on it, are unaffected. Abilities that apply “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” are replacement effects.

Tocatli Honor Guard’s ability stops a creature’s own enters-the-battlefield triggered abilities as well as other triggered abilities that would trigger when a creature enters the battlefield. This includes abilities that would trigger when Tocatli Honor Guard itself enters the battlefield.

The trigger event doesn’t have to specify “creatures” entering the battlefield. For example, Contraband Kingpin has an ability that says “Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.” If an artifact creature enters the battlefield under your control, that ability won’t trigger. If a noncreature artifact enters the battlefield under your control, the ability will trigger.

Look at the permanent as it exists on the battlefield, taking into account continuous effects, to determine whether any triggered abilities will trigger. For example, if you control March of the Machines, which says, in part, “Each noncreature artifact is an artifact creature,” each artifact will be a creature at the time it enters the battlefield and will not cause triggered abilities to trigger.
If Tocatli Honor Guard and another creature enter the battlefield at the same time, neither creature entering the battlefield will cause triggered abilities to trigger.

text: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.
